name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: A basic introduction to the fundamentals of creative writing, including the basics of structure, dialogue, and character development.

name: Intermediate Creative Writing
description: A more advanced exploration of creative writing, including topics such as narrative structure and the use of literary devices.

name: Advanced Creative Writing
description: A comprehensive exploration of creative writing, including topics such as stylistic conventions and the use of figurative language.

name: Introduction to Autobiographical Writing
description: A exploration of the fundamentals of autobiographical writing, focusing on the basics of crafting a narrative, utilizing personal experience, and writing from a unique point of view.

name: Advanced Autobiographical Writing
description: A comprehensive exploration of the craft of autobiographical writing, including topics such as memoir structure, exploring personal identity, and writing truthfully.
